name: Writing Table (Bureau plat)
description: Writing Table (Bureau plat); Attributed to Charles Cressent (French, 1685 - 1768, master 1719); Paris, France; about 1720 - 1725; Oak and pine veneered with satiné rouge and amaranth; gilt bronze mounts; modern leather top; 76.5 x 202.2 x 89.5 cm (30 1/8 x 79 5/8 x 35 1/4 in.); 67.DA.10; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Writing Table (Bureau plat)
medium: Oak and pine veneered with satiné rouge and amaranth; gilt bronze mounts; modern leather top
